Module ActiveSupport::CoreExtensions::Base64::Encoding
In: vendor/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/core_ext/base64/encoding.rb

Methods

encode64s  

Public Instance methods

encode64s(value)

Encodes the value as base64 without the newline breaks. This makes the base64 encoding readily usable as URL parameters or memcache keys without further processing. 

 ActiveSupport::Base64.encode64s("Original unencoded string")
 # => "T3JpZ2luYWwgdW5lbmNvZGVkIHN0cmluZw=="

[Source]

    # File vendor/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/core_ext/base64/encoding.rb, line 10
10:         def encode64s(value)
11:           encode64(value).gsub(/\n/, '')
12:         end
